pages.text: The $(mob)Harpy$() is a monster that spawns in Plains and Mesa biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to falling damage and may flee when below 25% health. It attacks players on sight, with leaping melee attacks with strong knockback and inflicting $(thing)Slowness$() on its target.
$(mob)Harpies$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().

$(mob)Harpies$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
